input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Timex"
Reference Product Name: "Marlin Automatic"
Reference Product Description:
The Marlin Automatic Sub-Dial brings a modern-retro update to our 1960s Marlin. Now with a stainless-steel bracelet, its sleek design has a contemporary style that’s sharp enough for any outing. While its full Arabic dial and date feature stay true to our much-loved Marlin automatics, this timepiece brings sophisticated details like a 24-hour format sub-dial at the 9 o’clock position and a recycled stainless-steel case in a curved cushion shape. The Miyota Japanese automatic movement is showcased through an exhibition caseback which bears the Marlin name and a detailed etching of the iconic marlin fish. The full Marlin name also graces the dial and crown to honor not only our watchmaking legacy, but the ever-evolving style of this suave ‘60s icon.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Hamilton Accessories Men's Big Beautiful Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Men's Bulova Automatic Sutton Black Leather Strap Watch 43mm'
  - Name='Orient Bambino Automatic Men's Watch'
  - Name='Tissot PRX UFO Robot Grendizer'
  - Name='Tissot PRX Powermatic 80 Steel & 18K Gold Diamond Bezel'
  - Name='Orient Kamasu Automatic Blue Dial Men's Watch RA-AA0002L19B'
  - Name='Hamilton Railroad Skeleton Men's Watch H40655131'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field Titanium Auto 42mm Men's Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Standard Stainless Steel Dial Analog Watch'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Sutton Automatic Leather Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Khaki Field Mechanical Automatic'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's Khaki Aviation X-Wind Chrono Auto'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's American Classic Valiant Auto H39525214'
  - Name='Hamilton Automatic Waterproof Wrist Watch'
  - Name='Orient Bambino Version 2 Watch'
  - Name='Men's Bulova Millennia Black Ceramic Automatic Watch 98A291'
  - Name='Orient Ray Raven II Automatic 200m FAA02003B9 Men's Watch'
  - Name='Fossil Men's Townsman Skeleton Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Casio Men's Edifice EFR-552'
  - Name='Hamilton Jazzmaster Open Heart Men's Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's Khaki Field Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's American Classic Railroad Automatic Stainless Steel Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Men's Jazzmaster Day Date'
  - Name='Bulova Men's Classic Automatic Watch'
  - Name='Hamilton Automatic 10K Rgp Round Day N Date Watch'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Accessories Men's Big Beautiful Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic movement and likely dressy silhouette, comparable to the Marlin Automatic, though exact details are unclear from name alone.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Bulova Automatic Sutton Black Leather Strap Watch 43mm
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic with dressy vibe and sub-dial layout, similar use and appeal to Marlin Automatic. Case material may differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Bambino Automatic Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar automatic dress watch with classic design and comparable construction, high functional overlap with Marlin Automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot PRX UFO Robot Grendizer
scores_with_rationales.rationale: PRX is a modern integrated bracelet watch and Grendizer may indicate special collaboration; likely sportier and less classic in style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tissot PRX Powermatic 80 Steel & 18K Gold Diamond Bezel
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic and dressy, modern details with different case styling but similar target user.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Kamasu Automatic Blue Dial Men's Watch RA-AA0002L19B
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Kamasu is a dive watch, sportier and bulkier, different silhouette and use but shares automatic movement.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Railroad Skeleton Men's Watch H40655131
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic with visible movement; however, skeleton watches have a distinct aesthetic but might appeal to similar buyers seeking sophistication.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Titanium Auto 42mm Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Field watch is more utilitarian and sporty than Marlin's dressy retro vibe, some overlap via automatic movement.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Standard Stainless Steel Dial Analog Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Though stainless and analog, likely quartz/basic mechanical without the sophistication or heritage of Marlin Automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Sutton Automatic Leather Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic dress watch, equivalent silhouette and functional use as the Marlin Automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Khaki Field Mechanical Automatic
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mechanical and automatic versions of field watches are generally more rugged/functional than retro dress watches like the Marlin.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's Khaki Aviation X-Wind Chrono Auto
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chronograph automatic with aviation focus, very different use and styling than retro-dress Marlin Automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's American Classic Valiant Auto H39525214
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic, classic dress style very close to Marlin’s vibe and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Automatic Waterproof Wrist Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic and water-resistant but unclear on style/dressiness; might have utilitarian features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Bambino Version 2 Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Another iteration of the Bambino, very similar silhouette and construction as Marlin Automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Bulova Millennia Black Ceramic Automatic Watch 98A291
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic and refined, but ceramic and more modern styling differentiates from Marlin's retro look.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Orient Ray Raven II Automatic 200m FAA02003B9 Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Diver’s watch, sport-specific with different intended use, though it is automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fossil Men's Townsman Skeleton Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic, dress-adjacent, with a skeleton aesthetic, could appeal to overlapping customers.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Casio Men's Edifice EFR-552
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Edifice models are typically quartz chronographs, more modern sports-oriented than classic dress like the Marlin Automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Jazzmaster Open Heart Men's Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic, classic case with an open heart display; shares function and style elements with Marlin Automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's Khaki Field Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic field watch; some overlap in movement/function, but form factor and intended use differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's American Classic Railroad Automatic Stainless Steel Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic automatic dress watch with stainless steel construction, directly comparable to Marlin Automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Men's Jazzmaster Day Date
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic, dressy design with date function, similar intended use/customer as Marlin Automatic.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulova Men's Classic Automatic Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic dress-style automatic like the Marlin, construction and appeal match closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Hamilton Automatic 10K Rgp Round Day N Date Watch
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Automatic with day-date features, vintage look but slightly different styling from the Marlin’s cushion case.
